name: Save Their Souls
description: Save Their Souls is a mix of platformer and memory game. Players must be fast and memorize the rescue plan of each level, then, run to save the inhabitants of the occupied apartment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Pentium Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon or GeForce graphic card Storage: 200 MB available space
